skilllist.skilldesc: Khaleed accumulates <font color="a6aafb">Desert Power</font> while moving. After <font color="a6aafb">Desert Power</font> is fully charged, he will glide on sand, increasing Movement Speed by 35%, making his next Basic Attack deal 50<font color="fba51f"> (+140% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target (cannot Crit), and reducing the target's Movement Speed by 40% for 1.5s.

Khaleed whirls his scimitar, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+140% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area and pulling them toward him. This skill can be used up to 3 time(s) in a row.

This skill deals 50% damage to Minions and Creeps.

Khaleed protects himself with the power of the quicksand, restoring 60 plus 5% of his lost HP and 10 <font color="a6aafb">Desert Power</font> every 0.5s, reducing damage taken by 25% for up to 4s.

While channeling, quicksand appears under his feet, slowing the enemy by 60%.
This skill is a Focused Cast. Any other controls will interrupt this skill.

Khaleed rides the sandstorm and charges toward a designated location, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way and knocking them toward his destination. Khaleed is immune to control effects during this process.

Upon reaching the destination, Khaleed will smash the ground, dealing 450<font color="fba51f"> (+160% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area and stunning them for 1s, and fully charge his <font color="a6aafb">Desert Power</font>.

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 100 (+10*Hero Level) plus 13% of the target's lost HP as <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target enemy hero.
This damage <font color="62f8fe">ignores shields</font>. If the target is slain by this skill, the cooldown will be reduced by 40%.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> plus <%Num2> of the target's lost HP as [C5True Damage] to the target enemy hero.####This damage [C2ignores shields]. If the target is slain by this skill, the cooldown will be reduced by <%Num3>.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 100 (+10*Hero Level) plus 13% of the target's lost HP as <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target enemy hero.
This damage <font color="62f8fe">ignores shields</font>. If the target is slain by this skill, the cooldown will be reduced by 40%.

Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equiptips:
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+850 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+20 Extra Magic Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskill2: Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equiptips:

+10% Spell Vamp

recommendmasterplan.name: SLEEPY
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Because Khaleed can deal a lot of AOE damage, he works well with heroes like Roger and Karina who excel at finishing off multiple low HP targets.

strong.desc: Khaleed counters heroes who lack mobility like Cyclops and Xavier since they will have difficult time avoiding his combo.

weak.desc: Khaleed is countered by heroes who have the ability to knock him back or airborne to interrupt his 2nd Skill, such as X.Borg and Chou.
